channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-1125] "IllegalStateException: Cannot set a region to be closed if it was not already marked as pending close"
item.description:
Its at startup. Here is the regionserver side of things:

...
2009-01-13 06:56:59,060 INFO org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.HRegionServer: Worker: MSG_REGION_OPEN: content,0d952ef7d6d31c81552d84ec99c61138,1231777275065

This puts region in funky state.
item.summary: "IllegalStateException: Cannot set a region to be closed if it was not already marked as pending close"

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
So, looks like as far as master was concerned, the region wasn't open yet. Here is the last thing we got about the problematic region:


2009-01-13 06:56:59,721 INFO org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.ServerManager: Received MSG_REPORT_PROCESS_OPEN: content,0d952ef7d6d31c81552d84ec99c61138,1231777275065 from 10.30.94.33:60020

It was 'opening' but the open fails because of above.

Looks like state transitions need to allow above possibility.

Here is a better picture of whats going on with the problematic region:


2009-01-13 06:56:53,697 INFO org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.ServerManager: Received MSG_REPORT_PROCESS_OPEN: content,0d952ef7d6d31c81552d84ec99c61138,1231777275065 from XX.XX.XX.33:60020

2009-01-13 06:56:56,701 INFO org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.ServerManager: Received MSG_REPORT_PROCESS_OPEN: content,0d952ef7d6d31c81552d84ec99c61138,1231777275065 from  XX.XX.XX.33:60020

2009-01-13 06:56:59,721 INFO org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.ServerManager: Received MSG_REPORT_PROCESS_OPEN: content,0d952ef7d6d31c81552d84ec99c61138,1231777275065 from  XX.XX.XX.33:60020

2009-01-13 06:57:08,734 INFO org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.ServerManager: Received MSG_REPORT_CLOSE: content,0d952ef7d6d31c81552d84ec99c61138,1231777275065: java.io.IOException: Could not obtain block: blk_7710643799735487760_4996202 file=/data/hbase/content/2063013531/url/mapfiles/5309895098547950637/index

2009-01-13 06:57:08,735 INFO org.apache.hadoop.ipc.HBaseServer: IPC Server handler 4 on 60000, call regionServerReport(address: 10.30.94.33:60020, startcode: 1231829713428, load: (requests=0, regions=21, usedHeap=158, maxHeap=1774), [Lorg.apache.hadoop.hbase.HMsg;@17496e57, [Lorg.apache.hadoop.hbase.HRegionInfo;@55eb1db2) from  XX.XX.XX.33:37051: error: java.io.IOException: java.lang.IllegalStateException: Cannot set a region to be closed if it was not already marked as pending close. State: name=content,0d952ef7d6d31c81552d84ec99c61138,1231777275065, unassigned=false, pendingOpen=true, open=false, closing=false, pendingClose=false, closed=false, offlined=false

java.io.IOException: java.lang.IllegalStateException: Cannot set a region to be closed if it was not already marked as pending close. State: name=content,0d952ef7d6d31c81552d84ec99c61138,1231777275065, unassigned=false, pendingOpen=true, open=false, closing=false, pendingClose=false, closed=false, offlined=false

...

Hereafter its hosed until A steps in and does manual fixup (I believe)
